name: Nocturne of Revelation
description:
The undead do not truly yearn for the absolute darkness; they do yearn for the full moon. That said, its pale light is both a blessing and a curse for them. During a full moon the holy hunter seeks to slays them, but will he be able to reach the throne of the Necromancer?

Use the moonlight (or the absence of it) at your convenience as you fight through the night.
